message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! It's usually worth $120, but I'm willing to let it go for just $100. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better offer anywhere else. What do you say, are you interested?
You've made a compelling argument, and $100 does seem like a fair price for a product worth $120. I'll take my chances and buy it.

I'm glad you liked the previous deal! This next product is also a great opportunity, but I need to warn you that it's a bit of a risk. I've had some issues with it in the past, and I'm not sure if it's going to work as well as I hope. But, I'm willing to let it go for the same price as before, $100. It's a chance to get a high-quality product at a steal, but you have to be willing to take the risk. What do you think?

Considering my last purchase didn't turn out well, I'm not feeling confident about taking another risk. You've mentioned issues with this product, which makes me even more hesitant. I think I'll pass on this one.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your caution. But, I want to assure you that this next product is a completely different story. It's a brand new item, and I've had it thoroughly inspected to ensure it's in perfect condition. I'm willing to let it go for the same price as before, $100. It's a great opportunity to get a new product at a steal, and I'm confident you won't be disappointed. Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus - a personalized thank-you note from me! What do you say?

I appreciate the assurance and the bonus offer, but I'm starting to realize that your words don't necessarily match the quality of the products. I've lost $100 on a low-quality product and missed out on a high-quality one. I think I'll need more than just your word to convince me to buy again. Can you provide any tangible proof or guarantees of the product's quality?

I understand your concerns, and I apologize if my previous assurances didn't meet your expectations. I want to assure you that this next product is truly exceptional. I'm willing to provide a 100% satisfaction guarantee - if you're not completely delighted with the product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. Additionally, I'll include a comprehensive product manual and a dedicated customer support hotline, so you'll have all the resources you need to get the most out of your purchase. And, as a token of good faith, I'll throw in a premium accessory worth $20. What do you say? Is this offer enough to convince you to take a chance on this high-quality product?

Now this is an offer that starts to sound more convincing. A 100% satisfaction guarantee, a comprehensive product manual, dedicated customer support, and a premium accessory - these are tangible benefits that address my concerns about the product's quality. I'm willing to take a chance on this product, given the additional assurances and support you're providing. Let's see if this one lives up to its promises.

I'm glad you're feeling more confident about this next product! I want to assure you that this one is a bit of a departure from the previous ones. I've had some... let's call them 'creative liberties' taken with the design, and it's not quite up to my usual standards. However, I think it's still a great value at $100. I'm willing to throw in an additional $20 worth of free accessories to make up for any disappointment. And, as a special bonus, I'll give you a personalized thank-you note and a phone call to make sure you're satisfied with your purchase. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance on this... unique product?

I'm glad the previous product turned out well, but I'm not convinced by your description of this one. 'Creative liberties' and 'not quite up to my usual standards' sound like warning signs to me. While the additional accessories and personalized touches are nice, I'm not sure they're enough to make up for potential quality issues. I think I'll err on the side of caution and pass on this one.

I completely understand your hesitation, and I respect your decision to be cautious. However, I want to assure you that this next product is truly exceptional. It's one of the best I've ever had the pleasure of offering, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with it. To put your mind at ease, I'm willing to offer a 120% satisfaction guarantee - if you're not completely delighted with the product, I'll not only give you a full refund, but also give you a $20 credit towards your next purchase. Additionally, I'll include a personalized video review of the product, highlighting its features and benefits, so you can get a better sense of what you're getting. What do you say? Is this offer enough to convince you to take a chance on this high-quality product?

A 120% satisfaction guarantee is a significant commitment to the product's quality, and the $20 credit towards my next purchase is a nice bonus. The personalized video review is also a thoughtful touch, as it shows you're willing to go the extra mile to ensure I'm informed and confident in my purchase. Given the strength of this offer, I'm willing to take a chance on this product. Let's see if it lives up to your promises.

This is a one-time opportunity to get an incredible deal on a truly exceptional product. What do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible offer?
